name: poisoned hero
description:
can you collect the appropriate flowers, craft them into potions and drink the right one before the poison spreads through your body? can you.. delay the inevitable?!

part clicker, part crafting, part survival! created for the Ludum Dare 50 Jam!

ran out of time for some menu elements, and the how to play section could’ve gotten a little bit more love, obviously. but the game is playable! my second jam game overall, and i’m fairly satisfied with it!

(warning: after a few waves of poison, the time you have to use an antidote becomes shorter. also, you need to allow a few seconds for the potion’s effect to repel the poison!)

credits

  • everything made by me, using the following open source tools: godot engine & libresprite
  • flowers art created from cc0 reference pictures
  • music generated by playing and tweaking knobs on the WolframTones experiment
